app.title: RWRS Another Page
app.search.placeholder: Search servers, maps, players, mode, country, etc...
app.help.title: Show Help Guide
app.column.name: Name
app.mapView.title: Map Order: {filters}
app.mapView.selectFilters: Select Quick Filters to View Map Order
app.mapView.chooseCategories: Choose your preferred map categories in Quick Filters to display the corresponding server list
app.mapView.noMaps: No maps found for selected filters.
app.toast.refreshing.title: Refreshing server list
app.toast.refreshing.description: Please wait while we fetch the latest data...
app.toast.refreshSuccess.title: Refresh server list success
app.toast.refreshSuccess.description: Data fetched successfully on {time}. Found {count} servers.
app.toast.refreshFailed.title: Refresh server list failed
app.guide.searchInput.title: Search Input
app.guide.searchInput.description: Use this search box to find servers, maps, players, modes, countries, and more. Results update in real-time as you type!
app.guide.columnVisibility.title: Column Visibility
app.guide.columnVisibility.description: Customize which columns appear in your table. Show only the data that matters to you!
app.guide.viewModeToggle.title: View Mode Toggle
app.guide.viewModeToggle.description: Switch between list and map view modes to find servers in your preferred way. List view provides detailed information in a table format, while map view offers a geographical perspective.
app.guide.helpGuide.title: Help Guide
app.guide.helpGuide.description: Click this button anytime to replay the help guide and refresh your memory about the available features.
app.guide.quickFilters.title: Quick Filters
app.guide.quickFilters.description: Apply filters to quickly find servers matching specific criteria. You can use multiple filters together and combine them with the search box for powerful queries!
